name: AS_GCM_CPS_ruleConditionClauseSetType
description: Component for rule condition clause set type
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!value: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(
      ri!ruleCondition[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.value]
    ),
    null,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_fromJson_v1"(
      ri!ruleCondition[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.value]
    )
  ),
  rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_dropdownField(
    label: if(ri!readOnly,"","Value"),
    labelPosition: if(ri!readOnly,"COLLAPSED","ABOVE",),
    required: true,
    placeholder: "Choose Clause Set Type",
    choiceLabels: rule!AS_GAM_translateMultipleBundleKeys(
      bundle: ri!bundle,
      bundleKeys: ri!refData.refKey
    ),
    choiceValues: ri!refData.refDataId,
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    value: local!value,
    saveInto: {
      local!value,
      a!save(
        ri!ruleCondition[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.value],
        local!value
      ),
      ri!additionalSaves
    }
  )
)
